question: Namaste Orchha' festival is celebrated in which state?
explanation:
\'Namaste Orchha\' is a famous cultural festival celebrated in the state of Madhya Pradesh. The three-day festival has just commenced in the famous tourist destination town of the state- Orchha.
The town is famous for several historical buildings and a Ramaraja temple. The festival will highlight the cultural and architectural heritage of Madhya Pradesh through several traditional activities. All the houses of the Orchha town have been painted with cream colour to celebrate the festival
